data.message: My name is Edward Little Jr., writing this from a friends's computer, My account was hacked and I can't even find it or access it any more. Please help me to restore it. It's been down almost a week and they hacked my Messenger too.

replies.message: Hey there. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this. If your account was taken over by someone else, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/2duWTw5. -Jessica

Facebook Hi Facebook i need help . My girlfriend account has been hacked as well as the email she used to reset the password. Current account also has been temporary disable by hacker . Can Facebook support team PM me to assist ? I do visit help central but none of the method work for me . She feel very sad because there's too much precious memories inside the account. Please help me . Thank you .
